remarks: The order relation defined on an image set is a subset of the base set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)
statement:
imasless.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) $.
imasless.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
imasless.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -onto-> B ) $.
imasless.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Z ) $.
imasless.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` U ) $.
imasless $p |- ( ph -> .<_ C_ ( B X. B ) ) $.
